decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to use efficient creatures and disruptive spells to quickly apply pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Gaddock Teeg slow down the opponent's spells, while cards like Knight of the Reliquary and Elvish Reclaimer provide strong threats on the board. Green Sun's Zenith and Once Upon a Time help find the right creatures when needed. The mana base is designed to support the deck's game plan and ensure consistency. Overall, the deck aims to be proactive and disruptive in order to secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy while utilizing cards like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent to apply constant pressure. The deck aims to maintain tempo with cards like Daze and Force of Will, while utilizing cards like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat for removal. It also includes cantrips like Ponder and Brainstorm for card advantage and selection, along with land disruption with cards like Wasteland. Overall, the deck focuses on early aggression and disruption to dismantle the opponent's game plan.

The main objective of this deck is to cheat big creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Atraxa, Grand Unifier into play using cards like Show and Tell and Sneak Attack. The deck also includes cards like Omniscience and The One Ring to generate additional mana to cast these expensive creatures. With plenty of card draw and countermagic like Force of Will, the deck aims to quickly assemble the combos needed to overwhelm the opponent and win the game in a spectacular fashion.

This Infect combo deck focuses on quickly dealing poison counters to the opponent using creatures like Glistener Elf and Blighted Agent, supported by pump spells like Invigorate and Berserk. The deck also includes protection with counterspells like Force of Will and Daze. It utilizes land-fetching cards like Misty Rainforest and Noble Hierarch to maintain consistent mana base for efficient plays. With efficient card draw from Brainstorm and Ponder, as well as selective removal options like Dismember and Force of Vigor, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with lethal poison damage before they can mount a defense.
